title: Boutique Daylesford Spa Country Retreat Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne with Daily Breakfast
description:
Embrace Daylesford's majestic natural scenery with a boutique Parisian-style stay, only a 90-minute drive from Melbourne. A private haven of just 15 unique rooms, Hotel Frangos offers the perfect retreat for those wanting to leave the hustle and bustle behind and experience the tranquillity of picturesque country Victoria.

Spend your time taste-testing the local wine at one of the region's many vineyards, enjoy a picnic at the picturesque Lake Daylesford, dine your way through the town's array of hatted restaurants or refresh your body, mind and soul in Hepburn Springs' famous mineral waters.

This rural retreat is also home to the charming Koukla cafe, serving a wide selection of locally sourced favourites, sweet treats, cocktails and wine under the vine-covered verandah. Full of character and distinctive design, Hotel Frangos offers a wonderful opportunity for travellers to lose themselves within one of Victoria’s most cherished leisure regions.

title: Exclusive Daylesford Country Retreat for up to Six Guests
description:
Romance abounds in Victoria's most talked-about regional town, Daylesford, located a scenic 90-minute drive from Melbourne CBD. Sneak away for a relaxing break in a place where the hills are greener, the pubs are cosier and the spas are better, staying in an ultra-luxe country home from the handpicked Daylesford Country Retreats collection.

Unwind in some of the region's finest apartments and homes and receive a leisurely 11am checkout. One and two-bedroom homes are available, plus a spacious Family Upgrade for up to six guests.

title: Romantic Daylesford Spa Country Retreat with Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up Daylesford's impressive natural scenery on a well-deserved escape at Hotel Frangos - a boutique Parisian-style hotel and noted Victorian landmark, just 90 minutes from Melbourne. An adults-only private haven of just 15 masterfully appointed rooms, Hotel Frangos is ideally located for leaving the hustle and bustle behind as you embrace the serenity of this picturesque part of Victoria.

Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the surrounding vineyards and kilometres of verdant forest, tasting your way through the town’s culinary scene or invigorating your body in Hepburn Springs' famous mineral waters. This soothing retreat is also home to the elegant Café Koukla, serving local products, Daylesford Collective chocolates and confectionery and wines, indoors or on the vine-covered veranda. Admire murals from local artist David Bromley while you dine, with artwork extending from the restaurant to the private guest lounge, Bromley Room and relaxed The Bar.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with a cooked breakfast at Café Koukla
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome drink each on arrival
- Indulge with a one-time shared entrée at Café Koukla
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi
- Enjoy the convenience of daily self-parking for one vehicle
- There’s no need to rush with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**Spa King Upgrade:** Upgrade to the King suite, with a romantic spa tub in the bathroom, and you'll also enjoy a mineral bathing pass for two at Hepburn Bathhouse and Spa. Drawing mineral-rich waters directly from their natural source, this century-old phenomenon delivers rejuvenation, relaxation, and enhances overall wellbeing.

title: Romance and Relaxation in Victoria's Spa Country
description: Romance abounds in Victoria's most talked about regional town: Daylesford, located a scenic 90 minutes' drive from Melbourne CBD. Sneak away for a relaxing minibreak in a place where the hills are greener, the pubs are cosier and the spas are better - staying at the trendy Hotel Frangos, right in the heart of Daylesford. Enjoy a delicious daily à la carte breakfast, a complimentary dessert per person at the hotel’s restaurant, evening drinks, two $25 Spa vouchers for the on-site Endota Spa and a leisurely late guaranteed 12pm checkout.

title: Cosy Daylesford Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$30 Dining Credit
description:
Explore spa country and the magnificent Daylesford - reminiscent of days gone by with breathtaking scenery, rich history and natural hot springs - with a stay at this retreat. Boasting contemporary warehouse-styled furnishings set in serene surroundings, this charming hotel offers a unique blend of countryside living and modern appeal.

From the moment you step foot inside the main guesthouse - the original industrial heritage Daytex Warehouse, constructed in the early 1900s - you will instantly feel the serenity of a quaint country town wrap around you like a warm hug. Spend days exploring local galleries, soaking at The Hepburn Bathhouse or feasting on local produce before returning to your lovingly restored hotel room or warehouse apartment.

title: Cosy Daylesford Country Escape with A$30 Food & Drink Credit & Daily Breakfast
description: Explore spa country and the magnificent Daylesford - reminiscent of days gone by with breathtaking scenery, rich history and natural hot springs - with a stay at the elegant Albert Hotel Daylesford. From the moment you step foot inside the main guesthouse - the original industrial heritage Daytex Warehouse, constructed in the early 1900s - you will instantly feel the cosy calmness of a quaint country town wrap around you like a warm hug. Spend days exploring local galleries, soaking at The Hepburn Bathhouse or feasting on local produce before returning to your lovingly restored hotel room or warehouse apartment, where a swathe of modern facilities awaits.

title: Romantic Daylesford Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Spa Credits
description:
Designed for serious relaxation, Hotel Frangos is a soothing retreat in the heart of Victoria's most talked-about regional town, Daylesford - a scenic 90-minute drive from Melbourne CBD. Framed by mineral springs and spas, Victorian Gold Rush architecture and local artisan markets, this Parisian-style hotel is a perfect boutique retreat in regional Victoria.

Enjoy delicious daily à la carte breakfast, a welcome drink each, a shared entrée at local favourite Koukla Café, two A$50 Endota spa credits to put towards two one-hour treatments, plus complimentary parking, Wi-Fi, and a leisurely late guaranteed 12pm checkout.

title: Contemporary Hepburn Springs Serenity with Wellness Hamper & Mineral Sanctuary Bathing Experience
description:
Bask in the allure of Hepburn Springs with an indulgent stay in Victoria’s legendary spa country, where contemporary elegance meets nature's spell. This unique retreat offers a rejuvenating experience amid mineral springs and lush, rolling hills.

Explore the area's picturesque walking trails, or head straight to the world-renowned Hepburn Bathhouse & Spa, complete with a mineral hammam, aroma room, underwater spa couches and much, much more.

When not making the most of the region's remarkable mineral waters, rest and relax in your spacious suite or villa, each boasting modern furnishings, a cosy fireplace, full kitchen and lavish spa bath for unparalleled comfort.
offer_address: 3 Forest Avenue, Hepburn Springs, Victoria 3461, Australia

title: Exquisite Two, Three and Four Bedroom Homes in Daylesford
description: Romance abounds in Victoria's most talked about regional town: Daylesford, located a scenic 90 minutes' drive from Melbourne CBD. Sneak away for a relaxing mid-week mini-break in a place where the hills are greener, the pubs are cosier and the spas are better, staying in ultra-luxe two and three bedroom retreats picked by Daylesford Country Retreats. Unwind in some of the regions’ finest apartments and homes and receive a leisurely late 11am check out, a gourmet hamper created exclusively for Luxury Escapes’ guests filled with delicious, local produce,  a bottle of wine and discounts on local attractions. Want to experience luxury at its finest? Check out the Sky High Retreat - a majestic 360sqm home fit for a VIP escape.

title: Daylesford Escape with Farmers Arms Wine and Gourmet Dining Inclusions
description: Soak up the beauty of historic Daylesford, one of Victoria's favourite countryside escapes, just 90 minutes' drive from Melbourne. Settle into a slower pace of life, staying just steps from the locals’ favourite pub in a stylish suite at the Farmers Arms Hotel Daylesford. Your package includes A$25 daily credit per room towards breakfast at nearby Cliffy’s Emporium, A$100 food and drinks credit per room to spend at the famous Farmers Arms pub, a bottle of Farmers Arms 'The Moonchaser' Shiraz Refosco , a complimentary minibar and a leisurely midday checkout.

title: Escape to Victorian Spa Country, Staying at the Famous Farmers Arms
description: Soak up the beauty of historic Daylesford, one of Melbourne’s favourite countryside getaways just 1.5 hours from the city. Settle into countryside life staying just steps from the locals’ favourite pub in an art-inspired suite at the Farmers Arms Art Suites. Your package includes an AU$25 daily voucher each for breakfast at the nearby Cliffy’s Emporium, a welcome drink each on arrival in the Farmers Arms pub and guaranteed late checkout at 12pm.

title: Cosy Daylesford Country Stay with Daily Breakfast, A$30 Dining Credit & Late Checkout
description:
Explore spa country and the magnificent Daylesford - reminiscent of days gone by with breathtaking scenery, rich history and natural hot springs - with a stay at this cosy retreat. Less than a five-minute walk from the main street the hotel boasts contemporary warehouse-style furnishings set in serene surroundings, offering a unique blend of countryside living and modern appeal.

From the moment you step foot inside the main guesthouse - the original industrial heritage Daytex Warehouse, constructed in the early 1900s - you will instantly feel the serenity of a quaint country town wrap around you like a warm hug. Spend days exploring local walking trails, soaking at Hepburn Bathhouse & Spa or feasting on local produce before returning to your lovingly restored hotel room or warehouse apartment.

title: Secluded Daylesford Homestead Escape Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne for up to 10 Guests
description:
Food, wine and nature sublime: discover it all with a stay at Loddon Retreat, a grand five-bedroom homestead in Victoria's Central Highlands. It might feel worlds apart from real life, but this exclusive countryside retreat is just a 90-minute drive from Melbourne. Located in Loddon River Valley, the homestead is surrounded by renowned wineries and restaurants that pride themselves on mouthwatering local cuisine and breathtaking natural landscapes. Hop in your car and explore the area at your own pace - discover the local tipple, indulge in paddock-to-plate meals, head out on a bushwalk or chase waterfalls at Loddon Falls.

Enjoy exclusive hire of the entire property for up to 10 guests and spend your days lazing in the sun underneath the fruit and olive trees and making friends with the resident alpacas. Come the cooler months, retreat inside to curl up by the wood fireplace. A large wrap-around veranda and oversized floorplan make the property an entertainer's delight - settle in with a home-cooked meal at the dining table and continue late into the night with a built-in bar and undercover outdoor area.

Enjoy delicious daily à la carte breakfast, a welcome drink each and a leisurely late guaranteed 12pm checkout.

title: Boutique Art-Inspired Daylesford Suites
description:
Settle into a slower pace of life and soak up the beauty of Victoria's spa country at Daylesford Art Motel. This art-inspired retreat, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, is brought to you by the team behind Daylesford's beloved Farmers Arms Hotel Daylesford, a local drinking hole since 1857. Today, this charming country pub is also known far and wide for its excellent food (try the pork belly, you won’t regret it).

Just across the road from the historic pub, you'll find cosy and elegant suites showcasing the works of a diverse range of local artists, from poets to painters. It's the perfect place to retreat after long days exploring the charming surroundings of Daylesford and Hepburn Springs. Unwind amid natural mineral springs, browse quirky local shops for art and collectables, and treat yourself to some of the best dining experiences in country Victoria.
